title: Civil War Battlefield Sites
name: Civil War Battlefield Sites
description: The locations of 72 Civil War Battle Sites across America where there are national, state, or local parks to commemorate the battle.

properties.name: **Andersonville National Historic Site
properties.description: Park grounds, including the historic prison site and the National Cemetery, are open 365-days a year from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. The National Prisoner of War Museum is open daily from 8:30 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. except for the following holidays: Thanksg

properties.name: **Antietam National Battlefield
properties.description: Daily, summer: 8:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.; daily, winter: 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day.

properties.name: **Appomattox Court House National Historical Park
properties.description: The Visitor Center is open daily from 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. It is closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Years. The heaviest visitation months are June, July, August, and October. Lightest visitation months are January and February.

properties.name: **Arlington House - The Robert E. Lee Memorial
properties.description: Arlington House is open to visitors every day from 9:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., with the exception of January 1st and December 25th when Arlington National Cemetery is also closed.

properties.name: **Brices Cross Roads National Battlefield Site
properties.description: Brices Cross Roads National Battlefield Site is open year round, dawn to dusk.

properties.name: **Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park
properties.description: The Chickamauga Battlefield Visitor Center and the Lookout Mountain Battlefield Visitor Center are both open from 8 a.m. to 4:45 p.m. Both visitor centers are closed on December 25. It is advisable to call the Lookout Mountain Battlefield Visitor Center,

properties.name: **Ford's Theatre National Historic Site
properties.description: Daily from 9am to 5pm; closed December 25. Ford's Theatre is an active theatre and may close temporarily with little notice, especially just before and after productions for rehearsals and set changes.

properties.name: **Fort Donelson National Battlefield
properties.description: Fort Donelson visitor center is opened daily 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.; closed Thanksgiving Day, December 25 and Janurary 1.

properties.name: **Fort Foote National Park
properties.description: Park is open 9:00 a.m. to sunset, daily except for January 1, Thanksgiving, and December 25.

properties.name: **Fort Moultrie National Monument
properties.description: Fort Moultrie is open daily from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. except for New Year's, Thanksgiving and Christmas Days.

properties.name: **Fort Pulaski National Monument
properties.description: Park hours are 9:00 am - 5:00 pm daily; extended summer hours are 9:00 am to 7:00 pm daily. The park is closed Thanksgiving and Christmas Day.

properties.name: **Fort Sumter National Monument
properties.description: The Fort Sumter Visitor Education Center at Liberty Square is open daily from 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. except for New Years, Thanksgiving and Christmas Days.

properties.name: **Fort Washington Park
properties.description: The park grounds are open 8:00-sunset at all times.  Closed January 1, Thanksgiving, and December 25

properties.name: **Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park
properties.description: The grounds are open daily from sunrise to sunset. Fredericksburg Battlefield Visitor Center and Chancellorsville Visitor Center, open 9-5 year round. Chatham Manor, Ellwood Manor, Salem Church and the Jackson Shrine have different operating schedules dep

properties.name: **Gettysburg National Military Park
properties.description: Park grounds and roads open daily, 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Visitor Center open daily, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (Summer hours- 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. daily.) Buildings are closed Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, & New Years Day. The Soldiers' National Cemete

properties.name: **Harpers Ferry National Historic Park
properties.description: Daily, summer: 8am to 6pm; daily, winter: 8am to 5pm; closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day

properties.name: **Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park
properties.description: Visitor Center building:  8:30am-5:00pm Mon-Fri; 8:30am-6:00pm Sat-Sun Visitor Center lot and battlefield grounds: 7:30am- 6:00pm Mountain Road:  8:30am-5:30pm {Monday-Friday only, excluding major holidays and weather permitting} Cheatham Hill Battlefield

properties.name: **Manassas National Battlefield Park
properties.description: The park is open during daylight hours every day. The visitor center is open daily from 8:30am to 5:00pm, except for Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day.

properties.name: **Monocacy National Battlefield
properties.description: The visitor center is open daily from 8:30am-5pm, and is closed New Year's Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day.

properties.name: **Pea Ridge National Military Park
properties.description: The park is open on a year-round basis, from 8:00am to - 5:00pm daily. The park closes Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day.

properties.name: **Pecos National Historical Park - site of the Civil War Battle of Glorieta Pass
properties.description: Summer Hours: Memorial Day to Labor Day, 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Ruins Trail and Visitor Center.  Winter Hours: Labor Day to Memorial Day, 8:00 a.m. to 5 p.m. Ruins Trail only.  The Visitor Center is open 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. during winter hours.

properties.name: **Petersburg National Battlefield
properties.description: Park is open from 9:00am to 5:00pm daily except Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, New Year's Day, and Martin Luther King Day.

properties.name: **Richmond National Battlefield Park
properties.description: Park battlefields are open during daylight hours. Visitor centers are open daily from 9am to 5pm; closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day.

properties.name: **Shiloh National Military Park
properties.description: The park is open daily from 8am to dusk all year except for Christmas Day. Peak season runs from April through Labor Day.

properties.name: **Stones River National Battlefield
properties.description: Park is open on a year-round basis, except for Christmas Day.

properties.name: **Tupelo National Battlefield
properties.description: The Visitor Center is open every day of the year except December 25, 8:00 a.m. to 5 p.m. (Central Time).

properties.name: **Vicksburg National Military Park
properties.description: Park is open daily except Christmas Day.

properties.name: **Wilson's Creek National Battle Park
properties.description: Daily, except Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day and New Year's Day.  Visitor Center hours are 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., seven days a week. Museum hours are 9 a.m.-Noon and 1-4 p.m., seven days a week. Note: The museum will be closed in December,  January

properties.name: Averasboro Battlefield and Museum
properties.description: The Battlefield Museum is open Tuesday through Saturday from 10 a.m. - 4 p.m. and Sunday from 1 - 4 p.m. The museum is closed on Monday. There is no admission charge to the museum, but donations to maintain the museum and its artifacts are always welcome.

properties.name: Battle of Carthage State Historic Site
Battle of Lexington State Historic Site
Bentonville Battlefield State Historic Site
properties.description: Signs for the battlefield are prominently displayed on Interstate Highways 95 and 40. Additional brown directional signs are located off Exit 90 (at I-95), at Jct. 701 & SR 1008, and on 701 at the traffic circle in Newton Grove.

properties.name: Centenary State Historic Site
properties.description: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., daily. Closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day. Guided tours are offered daily.

properties.name: Columbus-Belmont State Park
properties.description: # Grounds: Open November 1 to March 31, gates close daily at 3:00 pm. # Museum/Giftshop: Open April 1 to October 31

properties.name: Corydon Battle Memorial Park
properties.description: open year-round from 8:00am to 3:00pm.  Admission is free.

properties.name: First Battle of Kinston Battlefield Park
properties.description: The development of First Battle of Kinston Battlefield Park is a work in progress. At present the battlefield is interpreted at five different sites.  Free Parking; Donations Accepted

properties.name: Fort Branch Battlefield
properties.description: Open Saturdays and Sundays

properties.name: Fort Fisher State Historic Site
properties.description: April 1 - Sept. 30 Monday-Saturday 9 a.m.-5 p.m. Sunday 1-5 p.m. Oct. 1-March 31 Tuesday through Saturday 10 a.m.  4 p.m. Closed Sunday and Monday The site will be closed Veteran's Day, Friday, Nov. 11; Thanksgiving holidays, Thursday, Nov. 24-Friday, No

properties.name: Fort Macon State Park
properties.description: Fort Area: March, April, May, September and October 8 a.m.  7 p.m. June  August, 8 a.m.  8 p.m.  Fort, 9 a.m.  5:30 p.m. Closed Christmas Day  Park Office Hours 8 a.m. - 1:00 p.m., 2:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. Monday - Friday Closed state holidays

properties.name: Fort Morgan State Historic Site
properties.description: Fort open Nov. 1-Mar. 31 8-5, Apr. 1-Oct. 31 8-7; museum year-round 9-5.

properties.name: Fort Pike State Historic Site
properties.description: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Thursday through Monday. Closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day. Guided tours are offered daily.

properties.name: Fort Pillow State Historic Park
properties.description: 8 a.m. - Sunset (year round)

properties.name: Fort Zachary Taylor Historic State Park
Historic Blakeley State Park
properties.description: Hours: 9 a.m. to Dusk seven days a week.

properties.name: Honey Springs Battlefield Park
properties.description: Location is estimate.  Google maps nor Mapquest could locate.

properties.name: Mansfield State Historic Site
properties.description: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., daily. Closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day.

properties.name: Nash Farm Battlefield
properties.description: Nash Farm is open 8:00am - 11:00pm Daily.  Guided tours are available by request and appointment

properties.name: Natural Bridge Battlefield Historic State Park
properties.description: Hours of Operation  8:00 AM to sunset

properties.name: New Bern Civil War Battlefield Park
New Market Battlefield State Historical Park
properties.description: Hours of Operation: 9 AM - 5PM (closed New Year's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve and Day).

properties.name: Olustee Battlefield Historic State Park
properties.description: The park is open every day from 8 a.m. until dusk. The Interpretive Center is open daily from 9 a.m. until 5 p.m. All facilities are available free of charge.

properties.name: Perryville Battlefield State Historic Site
properties.description: * Grounds: Closed January and February.     * Museum/Giftshop: Closed January and February. Museum and Museum Shop Hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00

properties.name: Pickett's Mill Battlefield Historic Site
properties.description: Open Tuesday - Saturday, 9 a.m. - 5 p.m. and Sunday, noon - 5 p.m. The group shelter can be rented daily except Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day. The group shelter is closed unless reserved in advance.

properties.name: Prairie Grove Battlefield State Park
properties.description: * Museum open daily 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p. m.     * Picnic Area and Restrooms open daily 8:00 a.m. - one-hour after sunset.     * Museum, historic building and tours closed Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve at noon, Christmas Day and New Year's Day.

properties.name: Rich Mountain Battlefield Civil War Site
properties.description: Dawn to dusk. Cost: Free

properties.name: Rivers Bridge State Historic Site
properties.description: Days and Hours of Operation: Th-M 9am-6pm

properties.name: Sabine Pass Battleground State Historic Site
properties.description: Open Daily  Fees $2 entry fee

properties.name: The Mine Creek Battlefield State Historic Site
properties.description: March - November 9:30 a.m. - 5 p.m. Wednesday - Saturday December - February 9:30 a.m. - 5 p.m. Thursday - Saturday Closed all state holidays
